channel.title: CVE Feed for Mizuho Bank, Ltd. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Mizuho Bank, Ltd. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-16179|2024-08-05T10:17:38.293Z -- mizuho%20bank%2C%20ltd. -- mizuho%20direct%20app%20for%20android
item.description: The Mizuho Direct App for Android version 3.13.0 and earlier does not verify server certificates, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof servers and obtain sensitive information via a crafted certificate.
